'''''The Void''''' (also known as ''Tension'', {{lang-ru|''Ð¢ÑÑÐ³Ð¾Ñ''}}) is a [[2008]] [[survival horror]] [[adventure game|adventure]] [[computer game]] developed by the [[Russia]]n studio [[Ice-Pick Lodge]] and published in Russia, other [[Commonwealth of Independent States|CIS]]-countries, and Poland by [[ND Games]] on 17 April 2008. It won the "Most Original Game" award at the Russian Game Developers Conference, KRI in [[2007]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.kriconf.ru/2007/index.php?type=info&doc=award_winners |title=ÐÐ Ð 2007 - ÐÐ¾Ð½ÑÐµÑÐµÐ½ÑÐ¸Ñ Ð Ð°Ð·ÑÐ°Ð±Ð¾ÑÑÐ¸ÐºÐ¾Ð² ÐºÐ¾Ð¼Ð¿ÑÑÑÐµÑÐ½ÑÑ ÐÐ³Ñ |publisher=Kriconf.ru |date= |accessdate=2010-09-28}}</ref>

'''''The Void''''' (also known as ''Tension'', {{lang-ru|''Ð¢ÑÑÐ³Ð¾Ñ''}}) is a [[2008]] [[adventure game|adventure]] [[computer game]] developed by the [[Russia]]n studio [[Ice-Pick Lodge]] and published in Russia, other [[Commonwealth of Independent States|CIS]]-countries, and Poland by [[ND Games]] on 17 April 2008. It won the "Most Original Game" award at the Russian Game Developers Conference, KRI in [[2007]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.kriconf.ru/2007/index.php?type=info&doc=award_winners |title=ÐÐ Ð 2007 - ÐÐ¾Ð½ÑÐµÑÐµÐ½ÑÐ¸Ñ Ð Ð°Ð·ÑÐ°Ð±Ð¾ÑÑÐ¸ÐºÐ¾Ð² ÐºÐ¾Ð¼Ð¿ÑÑÑÐµÑÐ½ÑÑ ÐÐ³Ñ |publisher=Kriconf.ru |date= |accessdate=2010-09-28}}</ref>
The game was released in English-speaking regions on October 23, 2009,<ref>{{cite web|url=http://forum.ice-pick.com/viewtopic.php?f=28&t=5534&start=150 |title=Ice-Pick Lodge Forums â¢ View topic - US release date? |publisher=Forum.ice-pick.com |date= |accessdate=2010-09-28}}</ref> and then as a digital download on Steam since December 16, 2009.<ref>{{cite web|author=Single-player |url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/37000 |title=The Void on Steam |publisher=Store.steampowered.com |date=2009-12-14 |accessdate=2010-09-28}}</ref>
The game was released in English-speaking regions on October 23, 2009,<ref>{{cite web|url=http://forum.ice-pick.com/viewtopic.php?f=28&t=5534&start=150 |title=Ice-Pick Lodge Forums â¢ View topic - US release date? |publisher=Forum.ice-pick.com |date= |accessdate=2010-09-28}}</ref> and then as a digital download on Steam since December 16, 2009.<ref>{{cite web|author=Single-player |url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/37000 |title=The Void on Steam |publisher=Store.steampowered.com |date=2009-12-14 |accessdate=2010-09-28}}</ref>
